channel.title: Understanding Generative AI on The Shubham Co
channel.description: Recent content in Understanding Generative AI on The Shubham Co

item.title: What Is Generative AI?
item.description:
1. Introduction

Over the last few years, terms like ChatGPT, AI writing code, and AI creating images have gone from being research experiments to everyday tools.

At the centre of this shift is Generative AI.

But what exactly does Generative AI mean?
And why does it feel so different from the AI systems we’ve had for years?

This article answers those questions using plain language and real-world examples, so you build intuition before diving into theory.

item.title: How Is Generative AI Different from Traditional AI?
item.description:
1. Introduction

If you’ve worked with software systems for a while, you’ve already encountered traditional AI — even if you didn’t call it that.

Spam filters, recommendation engines, credit scoring systems, and fraud detection models have existed for years.

So a natural question arises:

What exactly makes Generative AI different from these systems?

This article breaks down that difference clearly, using comparisons and real-world examples, so you can build a strong mental model before moving forward.

item.title: AI vs Machine Learning vs Deep Learning (Where Does Generative AI Fit?)
item.description:
1. Introduction

When learning Generative AI, many people naturally ask:

  • Is Generative AI the same as Machine Learning?
  • Where does Deep Learning fit in?
  • Is AI just a buzzword for everything?

These are valid questions.

This article provides a clear, high-level orientation to help you understand how AI, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Generative AI relate to each other, without diving into mathematics or algorithms.

2. Artificial Intelligence (AI)

Artificial Intelligence (AI) is the broadest term.
